channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water pooling. Manhole cover near telecoms box, 20th November
item.description:
Pooling of water. Causing aquaplaning and an obstacle as pedestrians get splashed. This has been a long standing problem.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cirencester Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface after works is very rough, 20th November
item.description:
As you drive into Norfolk Avenue from Buckingham Avenue the left side of the road is very rough and there holes which are damaging wheels/cars. It looks like there was some work done to that part of the road but when re-surfaced really badly leaving it in the state its in now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Norfolk Avenue, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
